data.title: Sakellarios, Alekos, A(thens, 1913 - 1991), playwriter, journalist, director
data.text:
TV Series

►​ MONOGRAMMA

ΕΡΤ 2 - Produced in 1986 – two broadcasts a & b part

Film 16 mm - colour - duration 27΄: 10΄΄ & 27΄:00΄΄

► Reworked 2006 - introduced by Giorgos Sgourakis – duration 28΄ :56΄΄ & 29΄:50΄΄

First Showing: 15 & 22 December 1986 (Ε 31 August 1991 - 2006 - 2009 & NET 2010 & 2011)

Producer Giorgos Sgourakis, director Sotiris Labropoulos, photography Nikos Gardelis, sound Vasilis Kyriakopoulos, montage Spyros Anaktoridis, production coordinator Kostas Styliatis, production director Iro Sgouraki.

SOURCE: Giorgos and Iro Sgourakis Archive. Cinema – television – radio – sound – publishing – photography – art, Archive of Crete, Athens 2012

► MIchani tou Chronou (Time Machine)
